definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: This is the communication headset you'll see on lots of space suits.
sentences.chinese: 这是通讯耳机，你可以在很多的太空服上看到。

sentences.english: Would like to put on their spacesuits mighty showdown?
sentences.chinese: 想穿上威武太空服与他们一决雌雄？

sentences.english: They wore massive suits of armor, powered by servomotors.
sentences.chinese: 他们穿着由伺服马达提供动力的巨大盔甲太空服。

sentences.english: The most successful had been the "space blanket" of vacuum aluminized plastic film.
sentences.chinese: 最成功的是真空镀铝塑料膜的“太空服。”

sentences.english: Travel between consensus realities did not require spacecraft or spacesuits.
sentences.chinese: 一致实相间的旅行并不需要太空船或太空服。

sentences.english: Not only that, their developers say, they are comfortable and stylish.
sentences.chinese: 不仅如此，开发者说太空服很舒适也很有风度。

sentences.english: Of course, we are testing space suits for different levels of gravity.
sentences.chinese: 当然，我们正在测试的重力不同层次的太空服。

sentences.english: During that walk, the astronaut or "taikonaut" also will test a new Chinese-made spacesuit.
sentences.chinese: 其间，中国宇航员还将对中国制造的太空服进行测试。

definition: exoskeleton (the carapace of insects, crabs etc)
